## Context.isBound() method

Check if a key is bound in the context or its ancestors

**Signature:**

```typescript
isBound(key: BindingAddress): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [BindingAddress](./context.bindingaddress.md) | Binding key |

**Returns:**

boolean
